text: 2.7 Apo 22.21 God Pita nop wog ñek, Jisas takaw nop dad amɨl Juda binɨb okok kɨlop agñɨ ajup tek, yɨp abe wog ñek, Jisas takaw nop dad amɨl binɨb Juda mel okok kɨlop agñɨ ajɨpin. Anɨb ak nɨŋɨd nɨm agɨlak, God Pita nop wog ñek, Juda binɨb okok kɨlop takaw teplep agñɨ ajup tek, Pol nop abe wog ñek, binɨb Juda mel okok kɨlop takaw teplep agñɨ ajup agɨlak.
